What is the best approach for handing a situation where a project
exists th=
at represents an API to other projects? 

For example: Project1 and Project=
2 are separate projects which depend
on apiproject. 

Changes are made to a=
piproject, such that the tests within apiproject
pass. 

But, those changes=
 would now break project1 and project2. 

Would the solution be:
a) when ch=
anges are made to apiproject, automatically fire off the
tests for dependen=
t projects (in this case Project1 and Project2)?

b) Plan to run tests at p=
eriodic intervals of Project1 and Project2,
so that eventually, the break w=
ill become apparent? 

We plan to use CruiseControl to do automated builds =
and tests. Just
not sure how we can know when code in an api (subproject?) =
will break
the dependent projects. 

Thanks!
